silver.name: Band of Thieves I
silver.desc: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

silver.name: Celestial Blessing I
silver.desc: Your units heal for 10% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 200 Health.

silver.name: Exiles I
silver.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 25% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

silver.name: Second Wind I
silver.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 40% of their missing Health.

silver.name: Thrill of the Hunt I
silver.desc: Your units heal 350 Health on kill.

silver.name: AFK
silver.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 18 gold.

silver.name: Big Friend I
silver.desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 1600 Health take 9% less damage for the rest of combat.

silver.name: Cybernetic Implants I
silver.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and 10% Attack Damage.

silver.name: Cybernetic Shell I
silver.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and 30 Armor.

silver.name: Cybernetic Uplink I
silver.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

silver.name: Stand United I
silver.desc: Your units gain 1.5% Attack Damage and 1.5 Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

silver.name: Electrocharge I
silver.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 30-90 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

silver.name: Featherweights I
silver.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 20% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

silver.name: First Aid Kit
silver.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 25%.

silver.name: Future Sight I
silver.desc: Know who you will fight next. Gain a Zephyr.

silver.name: Item Grab Bag I
silver.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

silver.name: Lategame Specialist
silver.desc: Gain 40 gold when you reach Level 9.

silver.name: Luden's Echo I
silver.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 35-80 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

silver.name: Makeshift Armor I
silver.desc: Your units with no items gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

silver.name: Pandora's Bench
silver.desc: Gain 2 gold. At the start of every turn, Champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

silver.name: Pandora's Items
silver.desc: Gain a random component. At the start of each round, items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

silver.name: Preparation I
silver.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 25 Health, 3% Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

silver.name: Recombobulator
silver.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 Tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

silver.name: Tiny Titans
silver.desc: Your Tactician heals 30 Health, grows larger, and has 130 maximum Health.

silver.name: Tri Force I
silver.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 75 Health, 10 starting Mana, and 10% Attack Speed.

silver.name: Consistency
silver.desc: Gain double win and loss streak gold.

silver.name: Battlemage I
silver.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Armor and 15 Ability Power.

silver.name: Knife's Edge I
silver.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Attack Damage.

silver.name: A.D.M.I.N. Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional A.D.M.I.N. Gain a Camille.

silver.name: Anima Squad Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Anima Squad. Gain a Jinx.

silver.name: Brawler Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Brawler. Gain a Vi.

silver.name: Spellslinger Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Spellslinger. Gain an Annie.

silver.name: Sureshot Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Sureshot. Gain a Sivir.

silver.name: Defender Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Defender. Gain a Rell.

silver.name: Duelist Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Duelist. Gain a Fiora.

silver.name: Gadgeteen Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Gadgeteen. Gain an Poppy.

silver.name: Hacker Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Hacker. Gain 2 gold.

silver.name: Heart Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Heart. Gain a Lee Sin.

silver.name: Mascot Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mascot. Gain a Yuumi.

silver.name: Ox Force Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Ox Force. Gain a Fiora.

silver.name: Recon Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Recon. Gain an Ezreal.

silver.name: Renegade Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Renegade. Gain a Camille.

silver.name: Star Guardian Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Star Guardian. Gain a Yuumi.

silver.name: Aegis Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Aegis. Gain a Vi.

gold.name: Exiles II
gold.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 35% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

gold.name: Luden's Echo II
gold.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 50-110 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

gold.name: Metabolic Accelerator
gold.desc: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health after a PVP round.

gold.name: Phony Frontline
gold.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

gold.name: Tri Force II
gold.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 125 Health, 15 starting Mana, and 15% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Ascension
gold.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

gold.name: Axiom Arc II
gold.desc: Your units gain 30 Mana on kill.

gold.name: Big Friend II
gold.desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 1600 Health take 10% less damage for the rest of combat.

gold.name: Calculated Loss
gold.desc: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop refresh.

gold.name: Celestial Blessing II
gold.desc: Your units heal for 15% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

gold.name: Clear Mind
gold.desc: If you have no champions on your bench at the end of player combat round, gain 3 experience points.

gold.name: Cluttered Mind
gold.desc: If your bench is full at the end of player combat round, gain 3 experience points. Gain 4 random Tier 1 champions.

gold.name: Combat Training
gold.desc: Your Champions permanently gain 1 Attack Damage every time they kill an enemy unit. Champions start with 8% Attack Damage.

gold.name: Component Grab Bag
gold.desc: Gain 3 random item components.

gold.name: Cybernetic Implants II
gold.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and 20% Attack Damage.

gold.name: Cybernetic Shell II
gold.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and 40 Armor.

gold.name: Cybernetic Uplink II
gold.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2.5 Mana per second.

gold.name: Stand United II
gold.desc: Your units gain 2 Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

gold.name: Electrocharge II
gold.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 50-110 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

gold.name: Featherweights II
gold.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 30% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

gold.name: First Aid Kit II
gold.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 35%.

gold.name: Hustler
gold.desc: Instead of having no interest, you get 3 golds at the beginning of player combat rounds.

gold.name: Jeweled Lotus
gold.desc: Magic and true damage from your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 20% Critical Strike Chance.

gold.name: Last Stand
gold.desc: The first time you would die, instead drop to 1 Health. After this effect triggers, your units gain 180 Health, 18 Armor and Magic Resist, and 18% Omnivamp.

gold.name: Makeshift Armor II
gold.desc: Your units with no items gain 45 Armor and Magic Resist.

gold.name: Portable Forge
gold.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 3 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

gold.name: Preparation II
gold.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35 Health, 4% Attack Damage and 4 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

gold.name: Rich Get Richer
gold.desc: Gain 12 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

gold.name: Rich Get Richer+
gold.desc: Gain 20 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

gold.name: Salvage Bin
gold.desc: Gain a random completed item. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

gold.name: Second Wind II
gold.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 60% of their missing Health.

gold.name: Sunfire Board
gold.desc: At the start of combat, burn all enemies for 10% of their maximum Health over 20 seconds and reduce healing received by 33%.

gold.name: Three's Company
gold.desc: Gain 3 random 3-cost champions.

gold.name: Thrill of the Hunt II
gold.desc: Your units heal 550 Health on kill.

gold.name: Ancient Archives I
gold.desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits and 4 gold.

gold.name: Trade Sector
gold.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round.

gold.name: Trade Sector+
gold.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round. Gain 10 golds.

gold.name: Built Different II
gold.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 190-355 Health and 40-70% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

gold.name: True Twos
gold.desc: Gain 1 random 2-star Tier 1 champions and 1 random 2-star Tier 2 champion.

gold.name: Double Trouble II
gold.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 30 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

gold.name: Urf's Grab Bag I
gold.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 1 random item component.

gold.name: Scoped Weapons I
gold.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain +2 Attack Range and 10% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Battlemage II
gold.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Armor and 25 Ability Power.

gold.name: Knife's Edge II
gold.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Attack Damage.

gold.name: Underground Heart

gold.desc: Gain a Renegade Emblem and a Talon.

gold.name: Star Guardian Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem and a Rell.

gold.name: Threat Level: Maximum
gold.desc: At the start of combat, your Threats gain 60 Maximum Health for every Threat champion on your board.

gold.name: Aegis Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Aegis Emblem and a Vi.

gold.desc: Gain a Gadgeteen Emblem and an Annie.

prismatic.name: Band of Thieves II
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves.

prismatic.name: Cybernetic Implants III
prismatic.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and 30% Attack Damage.

prismatic.name: Living Forge
prismatic.desc: Gain a random Ornn item now and after every 10 player combats.

prismatic.name: Double Trouble III
prismatic.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 40% Attack Damage and 40 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

prismatic.name: Ancient Archives II
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 Tome of Traits and 8 gold.

prismatic.name: Binary Airdrop
prismatic.desc: Your champions equipped with 2 items temporarily gain a random completed item at the start of combat. Gain 1 random item components.

prismatic.name: Celestial Blessing III
prismatic.desc: Your units heal for 25% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 400 Health.

prismatic.name: Cruel Pact
prismatic.desc: Buying XP costs 6 Health instead of gold. But Heal 2 Health after a round.

prismatic.name: Cursed Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain +2 maximum team size, but take 100% increased player damage.

prismatic.name: Cybernetic Shell III
prismatic.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and 60 Armor.

prismatic.name: Cybernetic Uplink III
prismatic.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and restore 3.5 Mana per second.

prismatic.name: Stand United III
prismatic.desc: Your units gain 3 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

prismatic.name: Electrocharge III
prismatic.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 115-235 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

prismatic.name: Featherweights III
prismatic.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost units gain 50% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

prismatic.name: Future Sight II
prismatic.desc: Know who you fight next. Gain a Radiant Zephyr.

prismatic.name: High Roller
prismatic.desc: Gain 3 Loaded Dice and 5 gold.

prismatic.name: High End Shopping
prismatic.desc: Champions appear in your Shop as if you were 1 level higher. Gain 3 gold.

prismatic.name: Item Grab Bag II
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 random completed items and 2 Reforgers.

prismatic.name: Luden's Echo III
prismatic.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 90-210 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

prismatic.name: Level Up!
prismatic.desc: When you buy experience points, gain an additional 3. You can now reach level 10.

prismatic.name: New Recruit
prismatic.desc: Gain +1 maximum team size.

prismatic.name: Preparation III
prismatic.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50 Health, 7% Attack Damage and 7 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

prismatic.name: Radiant Relics
prismatic.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 5 unique Radiant items.

prismatic.name: March of Progress
prismatic.desc: Gain 5 bonus experience at the beginning of player combat rounds. You can no longer use gold to level up.

prismatic.name: The Golden Egg
prismatic.desc: Gain a massive golden egg that hatches in 11 turns. If you won vs player, receive bonus turn.

prismatic.name: Think Fast
prismatic.desc: Shop refreshes are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free shops. Gain 3 gold.

prismatic.name: Wise Spending
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 experience points when you refresh your Shop.

prismatic.name: Built Different III
prismatic.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 270-600 Health and 50-80% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

prismatic.name: Tri Force III
prismatic.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 200 Health, 25 starting Mana, and 25% Attack Speed.

prismatic.name: Urf's Grab Bag II
prismatic.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 3 random item components.

prismatic.name: Verdant Veil
prismatic.desc: Your units are immune to crowd control effects for the first 20 seconds of combat. Gains 15% Attack Speed.

prismatic.name: Windfall
prismatic.desc: Gain 20 gold.

prismatic.name: Windfall+
prismatic.desc: Gain 35 gold.

prismatic.name: Windfall++
prismatic.desc: Gain 40 gold.

prismatic.name: Birthday Present
prismatic.desc: Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's tier is your level minus 4 (min: Tier 1).

prismatic.name: Lucky Gloves
prismatic.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

prismatic.name: Woodland Charm
prismatic.desc: Your highest Health champion is cloned. Clones cannot hold items.

prismatic.name: Golden Ticket
prismatic.desc: Each time your Shop is refreshed, you have a 50% chance to gain a free refresh.

prismatic.name: BattlemageIII
prismatic.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 35 Armor and 35 Ability Power.

prismatic.name: Knife's Edge III
prismatic.desc: Your units that start combat in the first 2 rows gain 55% Attack Damage.

prismatic.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Underground. Gain a Zz’Rot portal and an Ezreal.

champion.name: Justice Punch
champion.desc: Gain a Galio. His Ability deals 150% more damage and knocks up its target for 2 seconds.

champion.name: Safety First
champion.desc: Gain a Galio. When you field him, your team gains 20 Armor and Magic Resist, doubled for 4 seconds after being shielded.

champion.name: Illuminating Singularity
champion.desc: Gain a Lux. Every 2nd cast, her Ability deals 135% increased damage.

champion.name: Lucent Barrier
champion.desc: Gain a Lux. Combat Start: She grants her 2 nearest allies a 500 Health Shield and 35 Ability Power.

champion.name: Dynamic Defenses
champion.desc: Gain a Gargoyle Stoneplate and a Blitzcrank. When he casts his Ability, its duration increases by 2 second per enemy targeting him.

champion.name: Rocket Grab
champion.desc: Gain a Blitzcrank. Gain a 400 Health. Combat Start: He pulls the farthest enemy and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.

champion.name: Reign of Anger
champion.desc: Gain a Renekton. He gains 65% Attack Speed and an additional 2% per 100 missing Health.

champion.name: Cull the Meek
champion.desc: Gain a Renekton. When you field him, your team deals 8% bonus damage, tripled against enemies below 50% Health.

champion.name: Divine Ascent
champion.desc:
Gain a Kayle. She gains bonuses per star level.
1: 30% Attack Speed
2: +2 Attack Range
3: Attacks fire 2 additional bolts dealing 50% damage.

champion.name: Righteous Range
champion.desc: Gain a Kayle. Combat Start: She and her 2 nearest allies gain +2 Attack Range and 25% Attack Speed.

champion.name: Stacks on Stacks
champion.desc: Gain a Nasus. He gains 20% Attack Damage, increased by 3% permanently each time he casts his Ability.

champion.name: Soul Eater
champion.desc: Gain a Nasus. When you field him, he and his allies heal 300 Health on takedowns.

champion.name: Kingslayer
champion.desc: Gain a Sylas. Gain maximum 25% and increase damage 35%.

champion.name: Petricite Chains
champion.desc: Gain a Sylas. When you field him, your team gains 30 starting Mana and his Ability increases enemies' maximum Mana by 35%.

champion.name: Laser Focus
champion.desc: Gain an Ashe. She gains 50% Attack Speed, doubled while her Ability is active.

champion.name: Corps Focus
champion.desc: Gain an Ashe. When you field her, your team gains 15% Attack Speed, doubled while her Ability is active.

champion.name: Bigger, Better Buckler
champion.desc: Gain a Poppy. She gains 180 Armor.

champion.name: Steadfast Presence
champion.desc: Gain a Poppy. Combat Start: Your strongest Poppy grants all allies a 325 Health shield.

champion.name: Flaming Ricochet
champion.desc: Gain a Gangplank. His Ability bounces to a second target dealing 90% damage.

champion.name: Get Paid
champion.desc: Gain a Gangplank. When you field him, your team has a 50% chance to gain 1 gold on kill.

champion.name: Edgelord
champion.desc: Gain a Talon. He gains 40 Ability Power. After killing an enemy, he restores 40 Mana.

champion.name: OX-ian Rage
champion.desc: Gain a Talon. When you field him, your team gains 10% Attack Damage and 10 Ability Power, tripled when they are below 50% Health.

champion.name: Cyclone
champion.desc: Gain a Wukong. He gains 10 Ability Power and increases his Ability's range by 1 hex.

champion.name: Re-Energize
champion.desc: Gain a Wukong. When you field him, your team restores 50% of their Mana after their first cast each combat.

champion.name: Growth Spurt
champion.desc: Gain a Lulu. When she casts her Ability, she gains 100 bonus Health and 20 Ability Power (this can stack).

champion.name: Foster Growth
champion.desc: Gain a Lulu. When you field her, she and her allies gain 40 Ability Power when equipped with an item.

champion.name: Adaptive Defensives
champion.desc: Gain a Camille. She gains 20% Attack Damage. The first time she drops below 50% Health, she gains a shield equal to 500% of her Attack Damage .

champion.name: Hextech Retribution
champion.desc: Gain a Camille. When you field her, your team deals 8% bonus damage, increasing by an additional 5% whenever an ally dies.

champion.name: Cleansing Safeguard
champion.desc: Gain a Lee Sin. His Ability costs 30 less Mana to cast. When he casts, he sheds all negative effects and heals 18% of his missing Health.

champion.name: Invigorate
champion.desc: Gain a Lee Sin. When your field him, your team gains 15% Attack Speed, doubled for 4 seconds after being shielded.

champion.name: Delivery Tips
champion.desc: Gain a Sivir. Every 2nd Ability cast, your strongest Sivir drops 1 gold with a 5% chance to gain 1 additional gold.

champion.name: Endless Pizza
champion.desc: Gain a Sivir. When you field her, your team heals 12% of their missing Health every 8 seconds. Eliminate all harmful effects.

champion.name: Rising Spell Force
champion.desc: Gain an Ezreal. When he casts his Ability, he gains @AD@% Attack Speed and 20 Ability Power for the rest of combat (this can stack).

champion.name: Raider's Spoils
champion.desc: Gain an Ezreal. Combat Start: Your strongest Ezreal grants his nearest ally a temporary Artifact for the rest of combat.

champion.name: Predatory Precision
champion.desc: Gain a Yuumi. She gains 5 Ability Power, 75% Critical Strike Chance and her Ability can critically strike.

champion.name: Zoomies!
champion.desc: Gain a Yuumi. When you field her, your team 22% Attack Speed, and zooms towards their targets.

champion.name: Unrelenting Force
champion.desc: Gain a Vi. When she takes damage, she gains 2% Attack Damage, 2 Armor, and 2 Magic Resist, stacking up to 25 times.

champion.name: Boxing Lessons
champion.desc: Gain a Vi. When you field her, your team gains 180 bonus Health.

champion.name: Hold the Line
champion.desc: Gain a Rell. She gains 80 Ability Power and 35% damage reduction.

champion.name: Channelled Ferromancy
champion.desc: Gain a Rell. When you field her, your team gains 20 Armor and Magic Resist. Each ally gains an additional 5 when they cast (this can stack).

champion.name: Frontline Fencing
champion.desc: Gain a Fiora. While her Ability is active, she gains 250 Armor and Magic Resist.

champion.name: Vitality of the Ox
champion.desc: Gain a Fiora. When you field her, your team heals 2% of their maximum Health when they attack.

champion.name: League of Draven
champion.desc: Gain a Draven. He gains 25% Attack Damage. When he kills an enemy, there is a 35% chance to gain 1 gold.

champion.name: Ruthless Blades
champion.desc: Gain a Draven. When you field him, your team gains 75% Critical Strike Chance.

champion.name: Get Excited!
champion.desc: Gain a Jinx. She gains 40% Attack Speed and Movement Speed. When she scores a takedown, triple this bonus for 7 seconds.

champion.name: Everyone Goes BOOM!
champion.desc: Gain a Jinx. When you field her, your team gains 9% Attack Speed, tripled after the first enemy dies each combat.

champion.name: Rock Solid
champion.desc: Gain a Malphite. He gains Ability Power equal to 180% of his Armor and his Ability's Armor duration is increased by 4 seconds.

champion.name: Guardian Spirit
champion.desc: Gain a Malphite. When you field him, your team restores 20% of their missing Health on cast.

champion.name: Reflector Shield
champion.desc: Gain an Annie. While her Ability's shield is active, enemies that attack her take 200 magic damage (once every 0.1 seconds).

champion.name: Burning Spirit
champion.desc: Gain an Annie. When you field her, your team gains 15 Ability Power, tripled while they are below 50% Health.

champion.name: Siphoning Winds
champion.desc: Gain a Yasuo. He gains 60% Omnivamp.

champion.name: Spirit of the Exile
champion.desc: Gain a Yasuo. When you field him, allies who start combat with no adjacent allies gain 22% Attack Speed.

champion.name: Double Bubble
champion.desc: Gain a Zoe. Her Ability launches a second bubble at a different target, dealing 70% damage.

champion.name: Sleepy Time
champion.desc: Gain a Zoe. Combat Start: She puts to sleep the 4 lowest Health enemies stunning them for 4 seconds.

champion.name: Aim Assist
champion.desc: Gain a LeBlanc. For every 2 sigils fired by her Ability, she fires an additional sigil at the lowest Health enemy.

champion.name: Mirror Image
champion.desc: Gain a LeBlanc. Combat Start: Your strongest LeBlanc creates a 75% Health, itemless clone of her nearest ally.

champion.name: Power Grid
champion.desc: Gain a Sona. She gains 10 Ability Power and her Ability fires 1 additional beam.

champion.name: Undercurrent
champion.desc: Gain a Sona. Combat Start: Your strongest Sona grants her 3 nearest allies 50 Mana.

champion.name: Star-Crossed
champion.desc: Gain a Kai'Sa. She grants 100% of her Ability's Attack Speed bonus to her nearest ally.

champion.name: Multi-Shot
champion.desc: Gain a Kai'Sa. Every 3 attacks, she fires a bonus attack at a nearby enemy.

champion.name: Gifted
champion.desc: Gain a Nilah. She gains 45 Ability Power. Combat Start: Your strongest Nilah grants her nearest ally a temporary copy of one of her normal items.

champion.name: Jubilant Veil
champion.desc: Gain a Nilah. Combat Start: She and her 5 nearest allies gain immunity to crowd control for 30 seconds.

champion.name: Smash!
champion.desc: Gain an Alistar. He restores 15 Mana per second and his Ability hits all enemies within 1 hex.

champion.name: Behemoth
champion.desc: Gain an Alistar. He gains 450 bonus Health and his Ability deals bonus damage equal to 30% of his maximum Health.

champion.name: Reverberation
champion.desc: Gain a Riven. She gains 15 Ability Power and her Ability is additionally cast on her lowest Health ally.

champion.name: Triumphant Return
champion.desc: Gain a Riven. Combat Start: She grants herself and adjacent allies a shield for 15 seconds equal to 40% of their maximum Health.

champion.name: Relentless Assault
champion.desc: Gain a Jax. After every 3rd attack, he gains 12% Attack Speed for the rest of combat (this can stack).

champion.name: Evasion
champion.desc: Gain a Jax. When you field him, your team gains 100% Dodge Chance for 2 seconds the first time they fall below 50% Health each combat.

champion.name: Absolution
champion.desc: Gain a Senna. She gains 30% Attack Speed and an additional 10% every 5 seconds.

champion.name: Corps Formation
champion.desc: Gain a Senna. Combat Start: She gains  30% Attack Damage.

champion.name: Spread Shot
champion.desc: Gain a Vayne. Her Ability additionally fires at 2 other nearby enemies dealing 65% damage.

champion.name: Into the Night
champion.desc: Gain an Edge of Night and a Vayne. When you field her, allies equipped with Edge of Night gain 35% Attack Speed.

champion.name: Frostburn
champion.desc: Gain a Vel'Koz. His Ability deals an additional 400% of its damage over the next 20 seconds (this can stack).

champion.name: Frozen Tundra
champion.desc: Gain a Vel'Koz. Combat Start: He slows the Attack Speed of all enemies by 30% for 10 seconds.

champion.name: Cosmic Barrier
champion.desc: Gain a Cho'Gath. When you field Cho'Gath, your team gains 35 Magic Resist, doubled for Cho'Gath.

champion.name: Energy Void
champion.desc: Gain a Cho'Gath. Each time his Ability hits an enemy, he steals 70% of their Magic Resist.

champion.name: Armored-dillo
champion.desc: Gain a Rammus. When you field him, your team gains 35 Armor, doubled for himself.

champion.name: Spiked Shell
champion.desc: Gain a Rammus. When struck by an attack, he deals magic damage equal to 150% of his Armor to all nearby enemies (once every 2 seconds).

champion.name: Resonance
champion.desc: Gain an Ekko. His ability hits all enemies within 2 hexes and deals additional damage equal to 400% of his Magic Resistance.

champion.name: Chronobreak
champion.desc: Gain an Ekko. When you field him, he stuns all enemies for 2 seconds after 10 seconds of combat.

champion.name: Stoneweaver
champion.desc: Gain a Taliyah. She gains 25 Ability Power and her Ability deals 20% more damage to enemies above 1600 maximum Health.

champion.name: Be the Stone
champion.desc: Gain a Taliyah. Combat Start: She shields the 3 highest Health allies for 50% of their maximum Health.

champion.name: Glacial Prison
champion.desc: Gain a Sejuani. She gains 20 Armor and Magic Resist and her Ability hits the entire board.

champion.name: Shatter
champion.desc: Gain a Sejuani. Her Ability stuns for 1 more seconds, and enemies take 33% more damage while stunned.

champion.name: Shadow Jutsu
champion.desc: Gain a Zed. He gains 20% Attack Damage. When he kills an enemy, he gains 20% of their Attack Damage for the rest of combat.

champion.name: Contempt for the Weak
champion.desc: Gain a Zed. When you field him, your team gains 7% Attack Speed. Upon scoring a taking down their target, they dash to a new one and triple this bonus for 2.5 seconds.

champion.name: Infuse
champion.desc: Gain a Soraka. Every 5 seconds, Soraka grants your team 20 Mana.

champion.name: Upgrade: Berserk
champion.desc: Gain a Soraka. After 15 seconds of combat, all of her Ability casts are empowered.

champion.name: Bunny Mercenary
champion.desc: Gain a Miss Fortune. Her Ability covers a wider cone and she gains a 200 Health shield while channeling.

champion.name: Make It Rain
champion.desc: Gain a Miss Fortune. After every 3 player combats fielded, It grants 10 on Stage 3, and 20 on any stage 4 or after.

champion.name: Style & Flair
champion.desc: Gain a Samira. She gains 30% Attack Damage. When she scores a takedown, she restores 30% of her maximum Mana.

champion.name: Daredevil
champion.desc: Gain a Samira. For every 10 Tactician Health missing, she grants your team 3.5% Attack Speed.

champion.name: Heartstopper
champion.desc: Gain a Viego. He gains 10 Ability Power and his Ability deals up to 50% increased damage based on the enemy's missing Health.

champion.name: Partners in Crime
champion.desc: Gain a Viego. When you field him, your team gains 12% Omnivamp, tripled when 2 or less allies remain.

champion.name: Punch Protocol
champion.desc: Gain a Sett. He gains 40 Armor and Magic Resist. His Ability knocks back the first enemy struck, destroying them if knocked off the battlefield.

champion.name: Regenerative Shields
champion.desc: Gain a Protector's Vow and a Sett. Briefly after the shields of his team break, he recharges them at 40% strength for 3 seconds.

champion.name: Back for Blood
champion.desc: Gain a Bel'Veth. She gains 25% Omnivamp, tripled while under 50% Health.

champion.name: Voidmother
champion.desc: Gain a Bel'Veth. Combat Start: Your strongest Bel'Veth creates 2 Voidspawns with 60% of their normal Health in front of her.

champion.name: Extinction Event
champion.desc: Gain an Aurelion Sol. He gains 15 Ability Power and his Ability's meteors are larger.

champion.name: Velocity Impact
champion.desc: Gain an Aurelion Sol. His Ability stuns enemies hit for 1.75 seconds.

champion.name: Supersize
champion.desc: Gain a Zac. He gains 1000 bonus Health and is immune to crowd control.

champion.name: Elastic Slingshot
champion.desc: Gain a Zac. Combat Start: He flings his 2 nearest allies to the enemy backline, knocking up enemies upon impact for 4 seconds.

champion.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
champion.desc: Gain an Aphelios. His attacks reduce the target's Armor by 20% for the rest of combat (this can stack).

champion.name: Locked and Loaded
champion.desc: Gain an Aphelios. When you field him, your team gains 5% Attack Damage and an additional 5% every 5 seconds.

champion.name: Category Five
champion.desc: Gain a Janna. Janna gains 50 Ability Power and her ability deals True Damage.

champion.name: Exaggerated Reporting
champion.desc: Gain a Janna. Forecaster's effects are increased by 100%.

champion.name: Not So Heavy Metal
champion.desc: Gain a Mordekaiser. He gains 20 Ability Power every 4 seconds.

champion.name: Obliterate
champion.desc: Gain a Mordekaiser. Combat Start: He reduces enemy Armor and Magic Resist by 20%.

champion.name: Power Overwhelming
champion.desc: Gain a Syndra. Allies summoned by her Ability gain 100% Attack Damage and 100 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist.

champion.name: Empowered Reserves
champion.desc: Gain a Syndra. When you field her, your team gains 5 Ability Power per unit on your bench.

champion.name: Perfected Solar Flare
champion.desc: Gain a Leona. She gains 30 Ability Power and her maximum Mana is reduced by 30.

champion.name: Eclipse Prime
champion.desc: Gain a Leona. When you field her, your team reduces all incoming damage by 20.

champion.name: They See Me Rolling
champion.desc: Gain a Nunu. He has 15 Ability Power and  20% movement speed.

champion.name: Contagious Laughter
champion.desc: Gain a Nunu. He gains 20 Ability Power and restores @Mana@ Mana per second.

champion.name: Traumatic Memories
champion.desc: Gain a Fiddlesticks. When an ally dies, it gains 350 bonus Health for the rest of combat.

champion.name: Absolute Corruption
champion.desc: Gain a Fiddlesticks. Combat Start: Fiddlesticks grants its nearest ally 30 Ability Power and allows them to share its Corrupted souls.

champion.name: Shiny
champion.desc: Gain an Urgot. His Ability has an additional 25% chance to dredge up treasure.

champion.name: Rising Tide
champion.desc: Gain an Urgot. Combat Start: He grants himself and adjacent allies 30% Attack Speed.
